title: Special episode: Indigenous peoples
description: We hear from our Indigenous and tribal listeners around the world, as we mark US Indigenous Peoples’ Day. We also meet an Amazon tribe defending their land from illegal loggers; a Maori singer who makes pop music in his traditional language; Native American chefs bringing cultural foods to the restaurant scene; and more.
itunes:subtitle: We hear from Indigenous listeners around the world as we mark US Indigenous Peoples’ Day
itunes:summary: We hear from our Indigenous and tribal listeners around the world, as we mark US Indigenous Peoples’ Day.
